name: Get in the Loop!
description:
Help a person who wasn't able to finish a game for Compo, and now wants to be stuck in a loop.

Game for Ludum Dare 47 Compo Jam gaining the ability to rate games

Note: The web version only works in recent versions of Chromium-based browsers. Use the downloadable versions if you encounter any problems. Controls
  • D/F/J/K - Move
  • R - Restart
Post-jam versions

The web version, and the 1.0.1 downloads are post-jam ports. Nothing else is changed compared to the original version apart from the renderer and the scaling mode, but the visual effects may become slightly different as a result.

Fonts
  • M+ Fonts: http://mplus-fonts.osdn.jp
